This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with various types of indolent B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma, testing the effectiveness of bendamustine hydrochloride and obatoclax mesylate drugs, with specific eligibility criteria including prior therapy, performance status, blood counts, liver and kidney function, and exclusion of certain medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with non-small-cell lung carcinoma, testing the efficacy of pemetrexed, carboplatin, and sorafenib compared to pemetrexed, carboplatin, and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 2 trial for diabetic macular edema, testing the effectiveness of dexamethasone and sham injection as treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for the treatment of Clostridium difficile infection, testing the effectiveness of drugs such as cadazolid and vancomycin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with unresectable gallbladder or bile duct carcinoma, testing the effectiveness of irinotecan hydrochloride as a treatment option. The eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the drugs glycopyrrolate, tiotropium, and placebo. The inclusion criteria include age, informed consent, COPD diagnosis, smoking history, lung function measurements, and airway reversibility. The exclusion criteria include allergies, blood eosinophil count, abnormal physical examination and ECG parameters, significant diseases unrelated to COPD, recent respiratory tract infection, oxygen therapy, other lung diseases, intolerance or hypersensitivity to treatment, history of alcohol or substance abuse, recent corticosteroid or tiotropium use, and pregnancy or lactation.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for the drug GSK1521498 and placebo in obese individuals, with eligibility criteria including a BMI greater than or equal to 30 kg/m2 and a Binge Eating Scale score greater than or equal to 19.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C, testing the drugs idx719 and placebo, with inclusion criteria including documented GT1, GT2, or GT3 chronic HCV infection, and exclusion criteria including prior HCV treatment and co-infection with hepatitis B virus (HBV) and/or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
This sample is a phase 2 trial testing the drug rabeprazole for the treatment of functional dyspepsia, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 2 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of docetaxel, cisplatin, 5-fu, cetuximab, and carboplatin in treating squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, specifically in patients with HPV 16 positive oropharyngeal or unknown primary tumors, with stage 3 or 4 disease and no evidence of distant metastases, and who meet other eligibility criteria.
This sample is a phase 2 trial for patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of dapagliflozin and placebo in reducing A1C levels, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2 trial testing the drugs busulfan, fludarabine phosphate, methotrexate, and tacrolimus for the treatment of various myeloid malignancies, including chronic myeloproliferative disorders, graft versus host disease, leukemia, myelodysplastic syndromes, and myelodysplastic/myeloproliferative diseases. The eligibility criteria include having a matched related or unrelated donor available and meeting certain patient characteristics such as no severe life-limiting diseases and meeting specific laboratory values.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with unresectable and/or metastatic clear cell renal cell carcinoma (RCC). The drug being tested is regorafenib (Stivarga) and the eligibility criteria include having measurable lesions, low or intermediate risk per the Motzer score, and an Eastern Co-operative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with recurrent small cell lung cancer, testing the effectiveness of 13-cis-retinoic acid and paclitaxel as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria for patient inclusion and exclusion.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C. The trial includes the drugs vaniprevir, pegylated interferon, ribavirin, and placebo, and has specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.
This sample is a phase 2 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of different doses of taspoglutide and a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
